snippet: Art Basel, the Switzerland-based grandfather of international art fairs, announces the lineup of its first Asian fair. How will the presence of a big-name European art fair affect the local art scene?
abstract: Art Basel, the Switzerland-based grandfather of international art fairs, announces the lineup of its first Asian fair. How will the presence of a big-name European art fair affect the local art scene?

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
